content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Greetings Max Müller. While discussing the rental price for the apartment in Duisburg, I initially have my eyes set on a higher bracket. Let's begin negotiations with a price of 1250 Euros per month.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for sharing your starting point. I'm keen on finding a more affordable deal. With my responsible nature and strong commitment to following ethical standards, I believe we can reach an agreement that benefits both of us. Let me propose a counteroffer of 1100 Euros per month for renting this apartment.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because your proposed price significantly undervalues the property and its prime location. However, I am open to finding common ground. Let's move the discussion towards 1200 Euros per month as a compromise. If you agree with this price, say 'I agree to the price of 1200 Euros!' to finalize the negotiation.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your concerns about the location and property value. Considering our aim to come to an agreement, I accept your compromise of 1200 Euros per month for renting the apartment. I agree to the price of 1200 Euros! TERMINATE
name: Max Müller from Germany
